resources.string: A gripping action film that follows the iconic DC Comics character Batman as he faces off against the Joker, a sadistic criminal mastermind.
A visually stunning science fiction epic that explores the vastness of space and the resilience of the human spirit in the face of insurmountable odds.
An epic historical drama that follows the journey of a Roman general who seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
A poignant and powerful drama that tells the story of two imprisoned men who form a bond of friendship and find redemption through acts of decency and integrity.
A moving and thought-provoking drama set on death row, where a gentle giant with supernatural abilities brings healing and hope to those around him.
A mind-bending science fiction thriller that delves into the realm of dreams and subconscious, blurring the lines between reality and imagination.
